          <title>
            <string language="en">Types of rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen der Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de roches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos de rochas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di roccie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι βράχων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tipos de rocas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows where and how the different kinds of rocks are formed. This can used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">basalt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">granite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metamorphic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentary</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt wo und wie die 
unterschiedlichen Arten der Felsen gebildet werden. Dieses Dose 
benutzt als beschriftende Übung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre où et comment les 
différents genres de roches sont formés. Ceci bidon utilisé 
comme exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra onde e como os tipos 
diferentes das rochas são dados forma. Isto lata usada como um 
exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra dove e come i generi 
differenti di roccie sono formati. Ciò latta utilizzata come 
esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει όπου και πώς τα 
διαφορετικά είδη βράχων διαμορφώνονται. Αυτό μπορεί 
χρησιμοποιημένος ως άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra donde y cómo las 
diversas clases de rocas se forman. Esto lata usada como 
ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
